description: Numbers n such that 2*10^n + 3*R_n is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that (7*10^n-1)/3 is prime.a(27) > 10^5. - _Robert Price_, Oct 19 2014
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 233...33.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 10 2000
extensions: a(22)-a(26) from Kamada data by _Robert Price_, Oct 19 2014
